description:
A fun learning adventure for people who have never used Flip Boom All-Stars to animate before. In this course they will learn the basics of how to create an animation of a bouncing ball and all the theory behind it to move forward. 

Please note: This course is only for people who already own flip boom all stars as it is no longer available. The animation parts apply to all programs but there are also in depth descriptions about the interface.

Learning Objectives

 

·       To introduce the animation principles

·       To discuss the concept of animation (what it means)

·       To demonstrate sample animations produced using Flip Boom All-Star

·       To outline the features of Flip Boom All-Star

·       To animate using Flip Boom All-Star

·       To introduce creativity

·       To create a flowing animation

·       To use the principles (focusing on squash and stretch)

·       To understand frame rates

·       To view and edit their animations

·       To export their animations
title: Bouncing ball animation using Flip Boom All-Stars
